# Problem 1

## Part A

Construct a multi-step map for the Ricker model, 

\begin{equation}\tag{1}\label{eq:Ricker}
	x_{t+1} = x_te^{r(1-x_t)}
\end{equation}

qualitatively describe the dynamics for each value $r = 2, 2.5, 3$. 

```{julia}
using GLMakie
function q1parta()
    rs = [2.0, 2.5, 3.0]
    
end
q1parta();
```
